description: This requirement is for Transport Canada to have the Collins DME-4000 DME repaired. The contract will be awarded from the date of contract award to March 31st, 2023. This is an open bid solicitation process.
full_summary:
### Repair Services for Collins DME 4000

**Release Solicitation Date:** 2023-02-02
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-02-17T14:00:00
**Contracting Authority:** Tanya Nadeau
**Contact Information:**
* Email: [tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca](mailto:tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-575-6684

**Description of Requirements:**

Transport Canada requires the repair of a Collins DME-4000 DME component in accordance with the Original Equipment Manufacturer specifications. The successful bidder will be required to repair the component to the required quality and reliability standards.

**Submission Instructions:**

Interested bidders are invited to submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions outlined in the solicitation document. The tenders should be delivered or received by the contracting authority by the closing date.

**Contract Duration:**

The contract period is from the date of contract award to March 31st, 2023, inclusive.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The proposals will be evaluated based on their compliance with the specification requirements and the price submitted.

**Special Requirements:**

Please note that this is an open bid solicitation process. Trade agreements do not apply to this tender.

**Notice URL:**

Not applicable

**Documents:**

Please find the solicitation document attached below:

[Attachment: T8493-22-0016ea.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/02/197b0a068818ab3cd799995c0367dd60/t8493-22-0016ea.pdf)
